attributes.action: Invoke EU Lisbon Treaty Article 50 Immediately.
attributes.additional_details: Until Article 50 is invoked the public can have no confidence that the result of the referendum will be honoured.
attributes.background:
The current Conservative government under David Cameron was elected on a manifesto committed to a referendum on EU membership - it was clear the result would either be to leave or remain.

To keep any faith with the public, this government must honour this commitment without delay.
